v.v: Praise Yahweh!
You who stand at the temple of Yahweh our God in its courtyards, ready to serve him,
Praise Yahweh because he does good things for us;
He has chosen us, the descendants of Jacob;
I say these things because I know that Yahweh is great;
Yahweh does whatever he desires to do
He is the one who causes clouds to appear from very distant places on the earth;
He is the one who killed all the firstborn males in Egypt,
There he performed many kinds of miracles
He attacked many nations
Sihon, the king of the Amor people group,
Yahweh gave us their land,
Yahweh, your name will endure forever,
Yahweh declares that we, his people, are innocent,
But the idols that the other people groups worship are only statues made of silver and gold,
Their idols have mouths, but they cannot say anything;
They have ears, but they cannot hear anything,
The people who make those idols are as powerless as those idols,
My fellow Israelites, praise Yahweh!
You men who are descended from Levi, you who assist the priests, praise Yahweh!
Praise Yahweh in the temple on Mount Zion in Jerusalem

v: You who worship Yahweh,
praise him!
praise him !
sing to him because it is a joyful thing to do so.
he has chosen us Israelites to belong to him.
he is greater than all the gods.
in heaven, on the earth,
and in the seas, down to the bottom of the seas.
he makes lightning bolts to flash with the rain,
and he brings the winds from the places where he stores them.
the firstborn of people and of animals.
to punish the king and all his officials.
and killed the powerful kings who ruled them:
Og, the king of Bashan,
and all the other kings in the land of Canaan.
so that it would belong to us, his people Israel, forever.
and people who are not yet born will remember the great things that you have done.
and he acts mercifully toward us.
things that humans have made.
they have eyes, but they cannot see anything.
and they are not even able to breathe.
and those who trust in those idols can accomplish no more than their idols can!
You priests who are descended from Aaron, praise Yahweh!
All you who have a reverential respect for Yahweh, praise him!
where he lives!
Praise Yahweh!
